src:
Timnas U-23 Bersiap ke SEA Games, Beto Goncalves Gabung Jumat
07 Nov 2019, 10:04 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyerang klub Madura United Alberto ‘Beto’ Goncalves akan bergabung dengan tim nasional U-23 Indonesia, yang disiapkan untuk SEA Games 2019, mulai Jumat, 8 November 2019.
“Besok saya berangkat ke Jakarta. Di sana saya akan menjalani terapi dengan dokter timnas,” ujar Beto, Kamis.
Menurut pesepakbola yang sudah mencetak 13 gol di Liga 1 Indonesia 2019 ini, tim dokter timnas U-23 terlebih dahulu memantau kondisi cederanya dengan pindai MRI.
Beto sendiri merasa yakin cedera otot paha belakang (hamstring) yang dialaminya sudah mulai pulih. Dia sudah kembali berlaga bersama Madura United yaitu saat melawan Persipura di Liga 1 pada Minggu (3 November).
Masuk di babak kedua menggantikan Aleksandar Rakic, Beto tidak merasa ada gangguan lagi ketika berlari.
“Sudah semakin enak. Jadi saya yakin hasil MRI nanti tidak terlalu mengecewakan. Saya yakin bisa pulih 100 persen dalam lima hari sampai satu minggu ke depan,” tutur pemain berdarah Brazil berusia 38 tahun itu.
Kehadiran Alberto ‘Beto’ Goncalves di timnas U-23 Indonesia sudah ditunggu oleh pelatih Indra Sjafri. Sebab, Beto menjadi pemain senior yang belum bergabung dengan timnas U-23.
Indra Sjafri sendiri memanggil lima pemain senior untuk timnas U-23 yaitu Evan Dimas, Hansamu Yama, Zulfiandi, Alberto Goncalves dan Manahati Lestusen.
Dari antara nama-nama itu, hanya Evan, Hansamu dan Zulfiandi yang sudah berlatih dengan timnas U-23 di akhir Oktober 2019. Namun, berbeda dengan Hansamu dan Zulfiandi yang kembali ke klub masing-masing, Evan masih berada di timnas U-23. Sementara Manahati dipastikan tak bisa ke SEA Games karena cedera.
Adapun Indra Sjafri harus memilih dua dari lima pemain senior untuk SEA Games 2019. Sebab, sesuai aturan, setiap timnas U-23 yang berlaga di cabang olahraga sepak bola putra SEA Games 2019 maksimal hanya bisa diperkuat dua pemain senior dari total 20 pemain yang ada di skuat.
Pertandingan cabang olahraga sepak bola putra SEA Games 2019 di Filipina berlangsung mulai 25 November 2019. Indonesia yang ditargetkan meraih medali emas bergabung di Grup B bersama Laos, Singapura, Brunei Darussalam, Vietnam dan juara bertahan Thailand.
Sebelum SEA Games, timnas U-23 Indonesia akan menghadapi Iran di dua kali laga persahabatan pada 13 dan 16 November 2019.
text:
U-23 national team preparing for SEA Games, Beto Goncalves Join Friday
Nov 7, 2019, 10:04 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Madura United striker Alberto ‘Beto’ Goncalves will join the Indonesian U-23 national team, prepared for the 2019 SEA Games, starting Friday, November 8, 2019.
"Tomorrow I leave for Jakarta. There I will undergo therapy with the national team doctor, "Beto said on Thursday.
According to the footballer who has scored 13 goals in the 2019 Indonesia League 1, the U-23 national team doctor team first monitored the condition of the injury with an MRI scan.
Beto himself felt confident that his hamstring had been recovering. He has returned to competing with Madura United, which is against Persipura in League 1 on Sunday (November 3).
Entering in the second half replacing Aleksandar Rakic, Beto did not feel any more distractions when running.
"It's getting better. So I'm sure the MRI results will not be too disappointing. I am confident that I can recover 100 percent in the next five days to one week, ”said the 38-year-old Brazilian.
The presence of Alberto ‘Beto’ Goncalves in the Indonesian U-23 national team has been awaited by coach Indra Sjafri. Because, Beto became a senior player who had not yet joined the U-23 national team.
Indra Sjafri himself summoned five senior players for the U-23 national team namely Evan Dimas, Hansamu Yama, Zulfiandi, Alberto Goncalves and Manahati Lestusen.
Of the names, only Evan, Hansamu and Zulfiandi had trained with the U-23 national team at the end of October 2019. However, in contrast to Hansamu and Zulfiandi returning to their respective clubs, Evan was still in the U-23 national team. While Manahati certainly could not go to the SEA Games because of an injury.
The Indra Sjafri must choose two of the five senior players for the 2019 SEA Games. Because, according to the rules, each U-23 national team competing in the 2019 SEA Games men's soccer can only be strengthened by two senior players from a total of 20 players in squad.
The 2019 SEA Games men's soccer competition in the Philippines will take place from November 25, 2019. Indonesia, which is targeted to win the gold medal, will join Group B with Laos, Singapore, Brunei Darussalam, Vietnam and defending champions Thailand.
Before the SEA Games, Indonesia's U-23 national team will face Iran in two friendly matches on 13 and 16 November 2019.
